gofumpt -w foo.go .
cmp foo.go foo.go.golden

-- foo.go --
package p

import (
	"golang.org/x/xerrors"

	errors2 "github.com/pkg/errors"

	"fmt"
	"errors"
)

func Func() {
	err := errors2.New("error")
	err = errors.Wrap(err, "failure")
	err = xerrors.Errorf("exception: %x", err)
	fmt.Println(err.Error())
}
-- foo.go.golden --
package p

import (
	"errors"
	"fmt"

	"golang.org/x/xerrors"

	errors2 "github.com/pkg/errors"
)

func Func() {
	err := errors2.New("error")
	err = errors.Wrap(err, "failure")
	err = xerrors.Errorf("exception: %x", err)
	fmt.Println(err.Error())
}
